title: @Riot, Please Help..
body:
Third post.  I have lost my account, "runrunTJ", after uninstalling and reinstalling League of Legends, also unable to log into it on my Boards.  As a level 30 who has been playing for 2 years, I doubt that I accidentally forgot my Username or Password.  Upon asking for help from "Forgot my Password / Username" I never get a response from my gmail.  Riot, please help..

EDIT : To add, I admit that I currently do not know the gmail I used to officially create my account, after checking.     
That probably made this a lot harder.  I'll try finding my gmail soon to make this account.

replies.body: Oh my god Targons Blade thank you sooo much

You can submit a request to recover you account in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) Be sure to fill out as much information about the account as possible so our account specialists can help you out.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=6V3w2U6m,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-27T23:38:28.928+0000)
>
> You can submit a request to recover you account in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) Be sure to fill out as much information about the account as possible so our account specialists can help you out.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

The problem is that I don't know the email I made with my account.  Is there anyway I can help besides that?  There is no possible way I can find it to be honest, I used my brother's and he has millions.
Making your best guess is better than leaving it blank. Just try your hardest to recall what it would most likely be and we'll work with you from there.
